solution.title: Solutions to common Machine Learning (ML) Problems
solution.subtitle: Simple step-by-step walkthroughs to solve common ML problems with Subliminal Ai.Extended Is An End-to-end Platform

card_1.title: Data strategy and Understanding
card_1.description: For new customers, it's important for us to get a holistic understanding of the data sources in your company, identify what's useful now and what isn't and provide clarity on cleaning up currently unusable data so it can be utilized in future analysis.
card_1.output: Output: Recommendations for multiple future projects that will directly impact the business bottom line.

card_2.title: Identify the highest value project and build a proof of concept
card_2.description: Every AI problem is difficult to get right the first time. We start by developing a good baseline model and solution that can be improved on over time. This ensures that the business idea is actually possible

card_3.title: Move the proof of concept into production
card_3.description: So we've ensured our idea will work and has potential, now is the time to collect more data and improve the models we've developed in the proof of concept so you know you can trust the model to drive the most
